title: Justice League Spectacular 01 (1992) (GWG)
description:
English | CBZ | 44 Pages

Justice League Spectacular 01
Publisher:  DC Comics
Publication Date:  March-April 1992

Writer:  Dan Jurgens and Gerard Jones
Pencilers:  Dan Jurgens and Ron Randall
Inkers:  Rick Burchett and Randy Elliot
Colorist:  Gene D'Angelo
Letterer:  Bob Pinaha
Cover Artists:  Dan Jurgens and Ron Randall

This story follows the events of Justice League America #60 and Justice League Europe #36, then continues in Justice League America #61 and Justice League Europe #37.

Following the break up of both the Justice League America and Justice League Europe teams, Ralph and Sue go on vacation to the Funny Stuff Amusement Park, which is taken hostage by the Royal Flush Gang. The RFG are re-organized by Max Lord as a way to bring the League back together, but the Weapons Master amped up their abilities mechanically, unbeknownst to Lord. Booster Gold, Blue Beetle, Fire and Ice race to the rescue, as does Superman after talking to Batman. The RFG's weapons are powerful enough to take down the Man of Steel. Ice calls Power Girl, Metamorpho and Guy Gardner for back up on the way to the park. It isn't enough as the RFG proves more powerful than expected, easily taking out Guy, Ice, Beetle and Metamorpho. Ice then manages to contact Hal Jordan via Guy's power ring, who recruits Crimson Fox, Flash, Aquaman, and Dr. Light. Working together, the heroes defeat the Royal Flush Gang. Pleased with their success, they recreate the two League branches: Justice League America with Superman, Fire, Ice, Beetle, Booster and Guy Gardner; and Justice League Europe with Hal Jordan, Dr. Light, Flash, Elongated Man, Power Girl, Crimson Fox and Aquaman. Metamorpho decides not to join either team at this time.

Thanks goes to GWG for this release.
